title: Critical MASA Investment Warning: Coinone’s Urgent Alert for Crypto Investors
body: BitcoinWorld Critical MASA Investment Warning: Coinone’s Urgent Alert for Crypto Investors South Korean cryptocurrency exchange Coinone has issued a critical MASA investment warning that every crypto investor needs to hear. This urgent alert comes as the exchange identifies significant risks associated with Masa token’s upcoming supply changes. But what does this MASA investment warning mean for your portfolio, and should you be concerned? Why Did Coinone Issue This MASA Investment Warning? Coinone’s decision to flag MASA stems from scheduled changes to the token’s total supply. The exchange explicitly stated that these modifications could trigger substantial price volatility. When a cryptocurrency’s supply dynamics shift, it directly impacts market stability and investor returns. This MASA investment warning serves as a protective measure for traders who might otherwise face unexpected losses. The timing of this announcement is crucial. Investors often overlook supply change announcements, focusing instead on price movements. However, supply alterations can dramatically affect token valuation. Coinone’s proactive approach demonstrates their commitment to investor protection in the volatile crypto space. What Makes Supply Changes So Risky? Cryptocurrency supply modifications create several potential challenges for investors. Understanding these risks helps explain why this MASA investment warning matters: Price instability – Sudden supply changes can cause rapid price swings Liquidity concerns – Market depth may decrease during transition periods Uncertain valuation – Traditional pricing models become less reliable Market sentiment shifts – Investor confidence may waver during changes These factors combine to create the perfect storm for volatility. The MASA investment warning specifically addresses these concerns, giving investors time to adjust their strategies accordingly. How Should Investors Respond to This Warning? When facing a formal MASA investment warning from a major exchange like Coinone, prudent investors should take specific actions. First, review your current MASA holdings and assess your risk tolerance. Second, monitor official announcements from both Coinone and the MASA development team regarding the supply change timeline. Consider diversifying your portfolio if MASA represents a significant portion of your investments. The MASA investment warning doesn’t necessarily mean you should sell immediately, but it does suggest increased caution and closer monitoring. Remember that exchange warnings typically precede periods of heightened market activity. What Does This Mean for Crypto Safety? Coinone’s MASA investment warning represents a positive trend in cryptocurrency regulation and investor protection. Exchanges are increasingly taking responsibility for alerting users about potential risks. This development benefits the entire crypto ecosystem by promoting transparency and informed decision-making. The MASA investment warning sets an important precedent. It shows that reputable exchanges are willing to prioritize user safety over trading volume. As the crypto market matures, we can expect more exchanges to follow Coinone’s lead in issuing timely alerts about potential market disruptions. Key Takeaways from Coinone’s Alert This MASA investment warning teaches us several valuable lessons about cryptocurrency investing. Always pay attention to exchange announcements, particularly those involving token economics. Understand that supply changes can significantly impact price stability. Most importantly, recognize that professional exchanges like Coinone issue warnings for valid reasons that deserve serious consideration. The crypto market continues evolving, and investor protection mechanisms are improving. The MASA investment warning demonstrates how the industry is developing safer trading environments through transparent communication and proactive risk management. Frequently Asked Questions What exactly is the MASA investment warning about? Coinone issued the MASA investment warning due to scheduled changes in the token’s total supply, which are expected to cause significant price volatility and market instability. Should I immediately sell my MASA tokens? While the warning suggests caution, it doesn’t necessarily mean you should panic sell. Assess your risk tolerance and investment strategy before making decisions. How long will this investment warning remain in effect? Investment warnings typically remain until the identified risk factors stabilize. Monitor Coinone’s official channels for updates on the warning status. Can I still trade MASA on Coinone during this warning? Yes, trading typically continues during investment warnings, but with increased risk awareness recommended for all participants. Are other exchanges likely to issue similar warnings? Other exchanges may follow Coinone’s lead if they identify similar risks, though each platform makes independent decisions about warnings. How often do major exchanges issue investment warnings? Formal investment warnings are relatively rare and reserved for significant, identifiable risks that could substantially impact investors. Share This Important Update Help protect fellow investors by sharing this critical MASA investment warning analysis on your social media channels. Many cryptocurrency enthusiasts might miss official exchange announcements, and your share could prevent someone from making uninformed investment decisions during this volatile period. Spread awareness about crypto safety today! To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency safety trends, explore our article on key developments shaping cryptocurrency investor protection and market stability. title: Analysis Firm Evaluates Bitcoin's Recent Drop! Announces the Most Critical Levels: "These Levels Will Be Fate-Decisive!"
body: Leading cryptocurrency Bitcoin (BTC) and altcoins are facing tough times. Currently, BTC has fallen to a seven-month low below $90,000. While this decline fuels bearish rhetoric and increased expectations of further declines, cryptocurrency analysis firm MakroVision has published its updated analysis for Bitcoin (BTC). Analysts noted that Bitcoin has failed to break above the prominent red trend line for months, leading to further selling and decline. MakroVision, outlining its Bitcoin expectations, stated that the failure to break the trend line and the recent declines are signs that weakness will continue in the medium term. Analysts pointed to the 0.618 Fibonacci level at $95.9,000 for the upside potential, stating that a rapid recovery above this level soon would be an important signal that the upward momentum is renewed. Analysts also stated that a rapid recovery above $102,000 is crucial for the uptrend, but on the other hand, they think that Bitcoin could decline as long as it remains below the red trend line, which is around $106,000. “…Only a sudden recovery of the $102,000 level can temper the decline. However, as long as the price remains below the red trend line, bearish pressure will clearly continue to prevail.” Bitcoin remains weak. The decline from the trend line confirms the bears' strength, and unless the $102,000 zone is reclaimed, the lower supports at $91,700 and $85,600 remain quite important. Bitcoin has seen a minor recovery in the last 24 hours, rising above $90,000 once again. #Bitcoin Chart Update BTC konnte sich nicht über die rote Trendlinie erholen, welche seit Monaten immer wieder sehr markant ist. Die Ablehnung zeigte stärkere Impulsivität und führte zu einem schnellen Abverkauf zurück in die unteren Support-Zonen. title: Chart Of The Day: Yes, T-Bills Are Now Besting Bitcoin
body: Summary As of this week, Treasury Bills are outperforming Bitcoin on the year. The MoneyShow Chart of the Day compares the total return of the iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF (IBIT) to the State Street SPDR Bloomberg 1-3 Month T-Bill ETF (BIL), the iShares 20+ Year Treasury Bond ETF (TLT), and the SPDR Gold Shares (GLD). Some holders got scared out of crypto by the liquidation event back in mid-October. Others are trading crypto as a tech stock-adjacent asset, so recent selling in Nasdaq and AI names has spilled over into the crypto world. By Mike Larson You might want to sit down for this one. As of this week, Treasury Bills are outperforming Bitcoin on the year! The bigger question for cryptocurrency traders, of course, is what happens next ? Take a look at the MoneyShow Chart of the Day, which compares the total return of the State Street SPDR Bloomberg 1-3 Month T-Bill ETF ( BIL ) to the iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF ( IBIT ). There it is in purple and orange - a gain of 3.6% vs. a loss of 1.7%. Bitcoin's relative performance looks a little worse against the iShares 20+ Year Treasury Bond ETF ( TLT ), up 5.7%. And it looks hideous when compared to the SPDR Gold Shares ( GLD ), up 53.4%. BIL, IBIT, GLD, TLT (YTD Total Return) (Data by YCharts) What’s happening? As this Bloomberg story notes : “Once promoted as a high-growth play, an inflation hedge, and a portfolio diversifier, the world’s largest cryptocurrency now faces the prospect of ending the year in the red - without fulfilling any of those roles.” Some holders got scared out of crypto by the liquidation event back in mid-October. Others are trading crypto as a tech stock-adjacent asset, so recent selling in Nasdaq and AI names has spilled over into the crypto world. Plus, the euphoria surrounding a lighter regulatory touch in Washington and broad-based ETF inflows has faded. Can anything turn the ship around? It’ll likely take a broader stabilization in the tech sector to rekindle risk-on trading in crypto. If Federal Reserve rate cut forecasts pick up, and the US dollar rolls back over, that could help, too. The passage of time and some sideways chop could also set the stage for a fresh leg up by weeding out the weak hands. At some point before long, though, I’d venture that Bitcoin will find its footing - and outperform T-Bills. Not by a small margin, either! Originally published on MoneyShow.com Editor's Note: The summary bullets for this article were chosen by Seeking Alpha editors.

title: Trump-linked investor Gill invests $300K in crypto as Bitcoin slides
body: The US representative for Texas’s 26th congressional district and Trump ally, Brandon Gill, revealed that he has expanded his investment portfolio by including $300,000 in Bitcoin and shares of the largest Bitcoin exchange-traded fund. This is according to his most recent transaction report, filed on November 18, with the Clerk of the House of Representatives. This follows a 27% plunge in Bitcoin from a record high above $126k last month. The purchase comes amid heightened volatility and renewed investor interest in digital assets despite the sharp decline. Gill, a former investment banker and close ally of President Donald Trump, bought between $100,000 and $250,000 in Bitcoin on October 20, and nine days later acquired $15,001 to $50,000 in BlackRock’s iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF (IBIT). Periodic House transaction disclosures report investment ranges rather than exact amounts. Meanwhile, reports from the House showed a diverse range of investments in figures rather than a specific amount. Gill’s cryptocurrency disclosures ignite discussions As a first-term lawmaker serving on the House Budget Committee, Gill has actively engaged with the Bitcoin world, making significant investments in the ecosystem since assuming his role in January. The representative’s overall holding in BTC totaled roughly $2.6 million, based on House transaction reports. The data also outlined that Gill invested up to $150,000 in IBIT this year. When reporters contacted Gill’s office for further comments on the matter, they declined to respond. According to reports from CoinMarketCap , Bitcoin is currently trading at $91,600.74, reflecting a 1.87% increase in the last 24 hours. Meanwhile, BlackRock’s IBIT oversees over $74 billion in assets. This amount is more than three times larger than the next largest spot Bitcoin fund, according to CoinGlass. Gill’s cryptocurrency disclosures revealed that the representative purchased up to $1.5 million in Bitcoin through three separate transactions over three weeks starting in late June. This move involved an investment of up to $1 million on June 20. Additionally, he received $850,000 in BTC in four separate transactions that commenced in late January. This purchase spree has drawn scrutiny. The government transparency group OpenSecrets raised concerns about Gill’s purchases. They declared that the representative failed to properly report up to $500,000 of his previous Bitcoin purchases. The law required him to report within the 45-day timeframe set by federal law. According to sources close to the situation, Gill reported a purchase of between $100,001 and $250,000 in the digital asset on January 29 and February 27, only to disclose these trades on June 2. At this time, the deadline set by the Stop Trading on Congressional Knowledge (STOCK) Act had already expired. Approved in 2012, the STOCK Act aims to eliminate insider trading and ensure lawmakers are accountable by mandating them to report their stock trades promptly and regularly, including those related to digital assets. Despite these efforts in place, sources have still raised concerns about how lawbreakers are fined. Based on the argument, the $200 fine they received is a relatively small amount, and congressional ethics committees frequently overlook this fine, highlighting the need to establish tougher measures in this sector. Rep. Gill proves to be a strong Bitcoin supporter Reports indicate that Gill is a strong proponent of cryptocurrencies, and his trade in January occurred days after Trump signed an executive order to loosen regulations on digital assets. For the February purchase, the sources highlighted that it occurred just ahead of Trump’s announcement of his strategic Bitcoin reserve program on March 6. In May, Gill made two more Bitcoin purchases, which he reported on time. His move led analysts to research and discover that US representatives for congressional districts embrace the cryptocurrency world. To support this claim, they mentioned that Georgia’s state representative, Marjorie Taylor, bought approximately $60,000 in IBIT this year, as reported by the House. Additionally, representative Guy Reschenthaler, who has represented Pennsylvania’s 14th congressional district, sold his Bitcoin, XRP, and Solana holdings earlier in the year. Gill also invests in the Invesco QQQ Trust ETF, a technology-focused ETF closely following the Nasdaq David Meyers, who is the director of communications and marketing at OpenSecrets, shared an email stating that “crypto transactions are just as ethical—or unethical—as stock transactions.” Claim your free seat in an exclusive crypto trading community - limited to 1,000 members.

title: Key XRP price levels to watch as crash below $2 looms
body: XRP is facing growing downside pressure as on-chain data signals a potential breakdown below the crucial $2 psychological threshold. The token has seen bearish sentiment in line with broader cryptocurrency market trends. According to insights from crypto analyst Ali Martinez, if bulls fail to defend current support levels, XRP could retrace significantly amid weakening momentum. In an X post on November 29, Martinez based his outlook on the latest UTXO Realized Price Distribution (URPD) data from Glassnode , which shows that XRP is now trading in a zone with thinning buyer support, increasing the risk of a deeper pullback. XRP UTXO chart. Source: Glassnode The data highlighted a dense concentration of previously realized prices around the $2.15 region, a level XRP recently slipped below, suggesting many traders may now be sitting on unrealized losses that could accelerate selling. If XRP continues to struggle beneath $2.15, the next major support zones identified by on-chain signals sit at $1.91 and $1.73. These areas reflect strong historical activity and could act as stabilizing levels if downward pressure intensifies. Long term investors signal more XRP collapse Another concerning factor for XRP is the behavior of long-term holders. Data shared by Martinez suggested a significant shift in sentiment among this cohort. Metrics from Glassnode’s Long-Term Holder Net Unrealized Profit/Loss (NUPL) indicate a transition from earlier phases of euphoria and denial to rising anxiety as the market price approaches the critical $2 threshold. XRP long-term holder NUPL. Source: Glassnode Throughout 2025, long-term holders have mirrored overall market volatility, with sentiment rising and falling alongside price swings. The latest downturn, however, points to weakening confidence among investors typically viewed as XRP’s most stable base. A drop below $2 would deepen this anxiety phase and signal a broader reassessment of XRP’s long-term value. While NUPL doesn’t forecast price movements, its psychological framing helps explain investor behavior. The current shift underscores growing pressure on XRP as the market waits for clearer direction. XRP price analysis By press time, XRP was trading at $2.15, down about 1.6% in the past 24 hours and roughly 11% on the week. XRP seven-day price chart. Source: Finbold XRP also hovers below its 50-day SMA at $2.55 and 200-day SMA at $2.60, signaling short-term weakness as the asset remains under key moving averages that now act as dynamic resistance. This setup suggests ongoing downward pressure, with the price needing to reclaim the 50-day SMA to hint at a bullish reversal. Meanwhile, the 14-day RSI at 38.73 remains in neutral territory, neither oversold (below 30) nor overbought (above 70), indicating stabilized momentum without signs of immediate exhaustion. Featured image via Shutterstock The post Key XRP price levels to watch as crash below $2 looms appeared first on Finbold .

title: XRP puts pressure on new buyers as 42% of supply sits in the red
body: Ripple’s XRP is in a precarious zone, after a year of supply turnover. After the latest market downturn, 42% of the XRP supply is in the red. XRP holders, especially short-term buyers, are challenged to hold through a precarious period. As of November 19, only 58% of holders have unrealized gains, with 42% of the supply underwater. XRP retained some of its earnings since 2024, but the supply turnover moved coins to new holders. Only 58% of holders have unrealized gains, down from 90% in October. | Source: CoinGecko . The metric suffered a rapid shift, as XRP holders were quite confident in October. At that time, over 90% of the XRP supply was in the green, suggesting a potential rally to a higher range. XRP fell to $2.19, after weeks of trading sideways. Currently, XRP sentiment remains low for retail traders. One of the major sources of pressure for XRP was the ongoing whale selling . While holders were confident about XRP, older whales and traders shed a significant part of their holdings, especially during periods of bullish sentiment. This allowed whales to cash out during the stronger market times, leaving other holders with losses. XRP saw holder turnover in the past year For XRP, the percentage of supply in profit returned to levels not seen since November 2024. At that time, XRP made its first hike from $0.50 to over $1, before an even stronger year-end rally. XRP peaked above $3 in 2025, but has not fulfilled expectations of a higher price range. In the past year, the available supply saw a turnover from whales to new holders, which acquired the asset at a much higher range. The main expectation for XRP was a climb to $10 during a more significant bull market. With the current correction, XRP is becoming riskier to hold, recalling previous waiting periods of years in a bear market. The current wave of holders continued to support XRP with expectations of a hike to over $6, fueling the buying during the year’s peak valuations. XRP open interest also remains relatively high, with more traders attempting to go long. However, XRP remains risky, with $3.9M in long liquidations for the past day. David Portnoy buys the dip on XRP Amid the recent price drop for XRP, an unexpected whale moved in. David Portnoy, known for his forays into meme tokens , announced an XRP purchase as part of pouring $2M into several crypto assets. Portnoy announced he bought $500K worth of XRP, among other assets, including ETH. The purchase was too small to boost XRP, and was not a sufficient driver for social media hype, due to generally low sentiment. XRP retains relatively high mindshare, due to its legacy status and the ‘Ripple army’ of posters, influencers, and early holders. Based on Messari data, mindshare expanded by 12% to a total of 1.2% , surpassing even more active assets. For now, XRP is seen as risky, potentially sinking into another years-long bear market, as mass adoption of the XRPL is still slow, with the protocol only carrying $73M in value locked. title: Revolutionary Sui-based Walrus prediction markets partnership transforms decentralized forecasting

With $10 million flowing through Myriad weekly, the platform clearly meets a genuine market need. The Walrus partnership only strengthens this position, making Sui-based Walrus prediction markets more accessible and reliable than ever before. What challenges do Sui-based Walrus prediction markets overcome? Despite their potential, prediction markets face several hurdles that this partnership effectively addresses. Data reliability remains a primary concern for many users. By integrating with established platforms like Decrypt and utilizing Walrus’s secure storage, the system builds trust through verified information sources. Another challenge involves user experience. Complex interfaces and slow performance often deter potential users. However, the Sui blockchain’s inherent speed combined with Walrus’s efficient data handling creates a smooth, responsive experience that rivals traditional financial platforms. Transforming decentralized forecasting forever The collaboration between Walrus and Myriad represents more than just another blockchain partnership. It demonstrates how specialized protocols can combine to create solutions greater than the sum of their parts. The Sui-based Walrus prediction markets ecosystem now offers a compelling alternative to traditional forecasting methods. As decentralized technologies continue evolving, partnerships like this pave the way for broader adoption. They prove that blockchain solutions can deliver tangible benefits beyond cryptocurrency trading. The future of prediction markets looks brighter than ever, with real-time data accessibility and enhanced reliability becoming standard features rather than luxury additions. title: Revolutionary Crypto Banking Startup Deblock Secures $35M for European Expansion
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary Crypto Banking Startup Deblock Secures $35M for European Expansion The crypto banking landscape just received a massive boost as Deblock, an innovative cryptocurrency banking platform, announces a groundbreaking $35 million Series A funding round. This substantial investment signals growing confidence in the future of crypto banking services and their integration with traditional financial systems. What Makes This Crypto Banking Funding Round Significant? Deblock’s successful $35 million raise represents one of the largest funding rounds for a crypto banking startup this year. The funding was led by Speedinvest, with significant participation from Shapers and Kraken Ventures. This strong investor backing demonstrates the increasing mainstream acceptance of crypto banking solutions. The timing of this investment is particularly noteworthy. Despite market fluctuations, institutional investors continue showing strong faith in the long-term potential of crypto banking infrastructure. This funding round positions Deblock as a major player in the evolving digital asset banking space. How Will Deblock Use the $35 Million Investment? Deblock has clear expansion plans for their newly acquired capital. The company will primarily focus on European market penetration, targeting key financial hubs across the continent. This strategic move addresses the growing demand for reliable crypto banking services in regions with progressive digital asset regulations. The funding allocation includes: Market expansion into European countries Platform development and feature enhancements Regulatory compliance across multiple jurisdictions Team growth and talent acquisition Why is European Expansion Crucial for Crypto Banking? Europe represents a strategic market for crypto banking services due to its progressive regulatory framework. The EU’s MiCA regulations provide clear guidelines for crypto businesses, creating a stable environment for growth. Deblock’s expansion aligns perfectly with this regulatory clarity. Moreover, European consumers show increasing interest in digital assets. By establishing a strong presence in this market, Deblock can capture significant market share in the evolving crypto banking sector. Their approach combines traditional banking reliability with cryptocurrency innovation. What Challenges Does Crypto Banking Face? Despite the optimistic funding news, crypto banking still faces several hurdles. Regulatory uncertainty in some jurisdictions remains a concern. However, Deblock’s European-focused strategy helps mitigate these risks by targeting markets with clearer regulatory frameworks. Other challenges include: Building consumer trust in new financial models Ensuring security and compliance standards Competing with traditional banking institutions Navigating cross-border financial regulations The Future of Crypto Banking Services Deblock’s successful funding round signals a bright future for crypto banking integration. As more traditional investors like Speedinvest back crypto banking ventures, we can expect accelerated innovation in digital asset services. This investment validates the growing importance of bridging traditional finance with cryptocurrency ecosystems. The crypto banking sector continues evolving rapidly, with startups like Deblock leading the charge toward mainstream adoption. Their European expansion could set new standards for how digital assets are managed and integrated into everyday financial services. Frequently Asked Questions What is Deblock’s main business focus? Deblock operates as a cryptocurrency banking startup, providing banking services specifically designed for digital asset users and businesses. Who led the funding round? Speedinvest led the $35 million Series A round, with participation from Shapers and Kraken Ventures. Which markets will Deblock target with this funding? The company plans to expand into European markets, leveraging the region’s progressive crypto regulations. How does crypto banking differ from traditional banking? Crypto banking combines traditional financial services with digital asset management, offering specialized services for cryptocurrency users while maintaining banking security standards. What makes European markets attractive for crypto banking? Europe offers clear regulatory frameworks like MiCA, creating stable environments for crypto businesses to operate and grow. When will Deblock’s expansion begin? While specific timelines aren’t disclosed, the funding enables immediate planning and execution of their European market strategy. title: Why Is Coinbase Flashing Its Deepest Bitcoin Warning in Months?
body: Suddenly, Bitcoin’s U.S. trading floor is sending one of its sharpest distress signals of the year. And now two premium indicators are plunging so deeply into the red that traders are asking who — or what — is unloading so much BTC. Coinbase Premium Slumps as Analyst Claims 18 Days of Continuous Bitcoin Selling A closely watched Coinbase Bitcoin Premium Index has flipped deep into negative territory as one market commentator claims the U.S. exchange has seen “zero buys” on the gauge for nearly a full day and selling pressure for more than two weeks. In a post on X, the account Against Wall Street urged traders to “take a look at the Coinbase Premium Index 1m chart,” saying the data show uninterrupted selling for 18 straight days and no recorded buy signals in the past 19 hours. The attached chart from Coinglass displays the premium rate in red below the zero line while Bitcoin’s price fluctuates in the mid-$90,000 range. Coinbase Premium Index Chart. Source: Coinglass / X The Coinbase Premium Index tracks whether Bitcoin trades at a higher or lower price on Coinbase compared with other major venues. When the metric turns negative, it suggests weaker spot demand from U.S. buyers relative to offshore markets. Extended negative readings can therefore point to sustained selling or an absence of aggressive dip-buying on the exchange. The post’s author described the pattern as “dumping nonstop” and questioned who might be behind the selling, asking why “they are unloading so much Bitcoin.” However, the tweet did not provide additional on-chain or order-book evidence to identify specific players, and Coinbase has not commented on the claim. Even so, the move in the premium index adds another signal for traders already tracking liquidity conditions across major exchanges. Bitcoin’s Coinbase Premium Gap Drops to Minus $90, Matching Earlier Stress Signal Meanwhile, a key liquidity gauge on CryptoQuant show s Coinbase ’s Bitcoin premium gap sliding to about minus $90, signaling a sharp discount versus other venues. Bitcoin Coinbase Premium Gap Chart. Source: CryptoQuant / X Analyst NekoZ highlighted the reading on X, calling it “a shift in market power” as the U.S. exchange’s spot price trades well below offshore markets. The premium gap tracks the difference between Bitcoin prices on Coinbase and those on other major platforms, offering a window into relative buying or selling pressure. The latest drop marks one of the deepest negative readings of the year. According to NekoZ, the last comparable move came in February 2025, when the premium gap fell to roughly minus $138. At that time, institutional investors were already pulling back, and the discount pointed to weaker demand on Coinbase. The renewed negative gap now adds another data point for traders monitoring whether U.S. spot flows are ceding ground to other exchanges.

title: Quantum Computing Blockchain Crisis: Vitalik’s Urgent 2028 Warning Reveals Critical Threat
body: BitcoinWorld Quantum Computing Blockchain Crisis: Vitalik’s Urgent 2028 Warning Reveals Critical Threat Imagine waking up to find your cryptocurrency investments completely vulnerable to attack. This terrifying scenario could become reality much sooner than expected. Ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin recently dropped a bombshell warning that quantum computing could shatter blockchain security within just four years. His urgent message highlights a looming crisis that every crypto investor needs to understand. What Makes Quantum Computing Blockchain Security So Vulnerable? At the recent Devcon developer conference, Buterin revealed that quantum computing advancements could break Elliptic Curve Cryptography before the 2028 U.S. presidential election. This cryptographic method forms the backbone of most major blockchains today. The threat comes from quantum computers’ ability to solve complex mathematical problems that current computers would need thousands of years to crack. Currently, blockchain networks rely on ECC for several critical functions: Generating private and public keys Authenticating transactions Securing digital signatures Protecting wallet addresses Why Is This Quantum Computing Blockchain Warning Different? Buterin’s latest warning represents a significant shift from his previous stance. Back in 2019, he suggested there was a substantial gap between achieving quantum supremacy and developing practical quantum computers. He compared the difference to that between a hydrogen bomb and controlled nuclear fusion. However, recent advancements have accelerated the timeline dramatically. The quantum computing blockchain threat isn’t just theoretical anymore. Researchers are making rapid progress in quantum technology, and the crypto industry must prepare now. Buterin strongly urged transitioning to quantum-resistant cryptography within the next four years to avoid catastrophic security breaches. How Can We Protect Against Quantum Computing Blockchain Attacks? The solution lies in developing and implementing quantum-resistant cryptographic algorithms. These new security standards would remain secure even against powerful quantum computers. The transition won’t be easy, but it’s absolutely necessary. Developers are already working on several approaches: Lattice-based cryptography Hash-based signatures Code-based cryptography Multivariate cryptography The race against time has begun. As quantum computing technology advances, the window for implementing these security upgrades continues to shrink. Every blockchain project must prioritize this transition to ensure long-term viability. What Does This Mean for Your Crypto Investments? While the quantum computing blockchain threat sounds alarming, there’s still time to prepare. The crypto community has faced challenges before and emerged stronger. This situation underscores the importance of staying informed about technological developments that could impact your investments. The key takeaway is clear: the quantum computing blockchain security challenge requires immediate attention and action. By addressing this threat proactively, the industry can build more resilient systems that withstand future technological advances. Frequently Asked Questions What exactly is the quantum computing blockchain threat? Quantum computers could break the cryptographic security that protects blockchain networks, potentially exposing private keys and compromising transaction security. When could quantum computing break blockchain security? Vitalik Buterin warns this could happen as early as 2028, giving the industry about four years to implement quantum-resistant solutions. Which cryptocurrencies are most vulnerable? All blockchains using Elliptic Curve Cryptography, including Bitcoin and Ethereum, face similar quantum computing blockchain security risks. What are quantum-resistant cryptocurrencies? These are blockchain projects already implementing cryptographic methods designed to withstand attacks from quantum computers. Can existing blockchains be upgraded for quantum resistance? Yes, most major blockchains can implement quantum-resistant upgrades through protocol changes and hard forks. Should I be worried about my current crypto holdings? While the threat is real, the crypto industry has time to implement solutions. Staying informed about development progress is crucial. Found this information crucial for understanding future crypto security? Share this article with fellow investors to spread awareness about the quantum computing blockchain threat. Knowledge is our best defense against emerging technological risks. To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency security trends, explore our article on key developments shaping blockchain technology future adoption and security measures. title: Trump calls for nationwide standard to regulate AI
body: U.S. President Donald Trump has urged lawmakers to limit overregulation in the sector. Trump stated that overregulation is a significant hurdle undermining AI growth. He suggested that lawmakers establish a nationwide standard to regulate AI innovation. U.S. President Donald Trump has called for nationwide standard regulations in the AI sector, citing concerns about overregulation. He complained that the sector is facing a significant hurdle from state regulations that could limit its growth. Trump explained that investments channeled to AI development are helping the U.S. economy by making it the “HOTTEST” in the world. Trump says AI state regulation could slow down the sector’s development Trump wrote on Truth Social that some states are trying to embed DEI ideology to produce what he termed “woke AI” models. He discouraged having 50 state regulatory regimes governing AI development, stating that the variations risk slowing development in the tech sector. Trump mentioned that there exists the possibility of achieving AI developments in a way that protects children and prevents censorship. He also highlighted that China will overtake the U.S. in the AI race if America over-regulates the sector. Trump advised lawmakers to pass a separate bill and place a provision in the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA) to address the issues at hand. Jensen Huang, CEO of Nvidia Corp., also made similar remarks, saying that China boasts streamlined regulations that give Beijing a competitive advantage in the AI race over the United States. He also noted that China has advanced AI technology, with its AI researchers accounting for approximately 50% of the world’s AI researchers. OpenAI warns that state regulations could bury AI companies The news comes amid concerns from AI companies based in the U.S. over state regulations of the sector. Cryptopolitan previously reported in mid-March that leading AI companies, such as OpenAI, support federal regulation over state regulation of AI legislation. OpenAI urged the Trump administration to block state AI regulations in exchange for access to its AI model. OpenAI argued that fragmented regulations at the state level raise serious concerns about the possibility of damaging America’s position as the leading AI hub. OpenAI’s concerns arose at a time when hundreds of AI-related bills were under review across the U.S. The AI company cautioned that state regulations will hinder both small and large AI corporations, thereby limiting their growth. The company highlighted its concerns in a 15-page policy document released in response to a request from the White House for public feedback on AI policy. Steve Scalise, House Majority Leader and a Louisiana Republican, said earlier this week that Republican leaders were “looking at” adding the language into the National Defense Authorization Act. The regulation, which sets the Pentagon’s budget and expenditures, often becomes a vehicle for other policy measures. The bill is set to ban state regulation of AI development effectively. Bloomberg reported that several proposals are currently being discussed, including the exemption of AI companies from state regulation if they agree to federal standards in other areas, such as child safety. Despite the AI race gaining traction, investors have expressed fears that the AI bubble is about to burst. Global financial markets have fallen sharply in the U.S., Asia, and Europe amid concerns that the surge in valuations of artificial intelligence (AI) companies could be declining rapidly. Cryptopolitan reported in early November that Tech and AI stocks on Wall Street had their worst week since April as investors slowed down on high‑risk trades. AI companies Palantir and Oracle were among the stocks that were heavily hit. The crypto market also pulled back significantly, sending Bitcoin below $100k for the first time since June. Don’t just read crypto news. Understand it. Subscribe to our newsletter. It's free .

title: Institutional Interest Surges: Bitcoin Munari’s Architecture Attracts Major Enterprise Blockchain Players
body: Institutional demand for blockchain systems continues to shift toward platforms that deliver predictable performance, programmable functionality, and clearly defined economic structures. Organizations evaluating long-term digital infrastructure often prioritize systems that combine controlled execution environments with transparent supply models and compatibility with existing workflows. Bitcoin Munari introduces an architecture designed around these requirements. The system applies a fixed-supply model derived from Bitcoin while expanding operational scope through a Solana launch phase and a dedicated Layer-1 chain that supports validator participation, smart contracts, privacy tools, and governance. This combination has drawn interest from institutions that monitor developments across programmable blockchains and controlled execution networks. Enterprise Context in the Current Blockchain Landscape Several platforms form the core of today’s enterprise blockchain sector, each addressing specific operational and regulatory needs. Ethereum Ethereum provides a public smart-contract network used for tokenization, automated settlement, and application development. Enterprises rely on Ethereum’s established developer ecosystem, standardized tooling, and compatibility with private or permissioned variants supported by the Enterprise Ethereum Alliance. Its programmable environment enables organizations to test and deploy workflows that require automation, asset issuance, or complex transaction logic. Hyperledger Fabric Hyperledger Fabric uses a modular, permissioned design under the Linux Foundation. Its identity-driven architecture, channel-based data segregation, and configurable consensus mechanisms support deployments in sectors such as supply chain, government, and healthcare. Enterprises use Fabric for applications that require controlled participation, detailed audit trails, and reliable transaction throughput. IBM Blockchain Platform The IBM Blockchain Platform extends Fabric with managed hosting, governance tools, and enterprise connectors. Organizations adopt this environment for cross-organization data sharing, supply chain automation, and financial documentation workflows. Its design supports integrated monitoring, identity management, and lifecycle control for networks that need direct compatibility with existing enterprise software. Hedera Hedera operates as a public ledger using Proof-of-Stake and hashgraph consensus. Its governance council, which includes global corporations, oversees network parameters and operational policy. Enterprises use Hedera for tokenization, supply chain data, and identity systems requiring predictable fees, consistent throughput, and clear governance structures. These platforms illustrate the characteristics institutions consistently evaluate: programmability, identity frameworks, predictable execution, and operational clarity. Bitcoin Munari’s Position Within This Institutional Framework Bitcoin Munari applies a fixed-supply monetary model while providing infrastructure suited for programmable applications. The initial Solana deployment introduces an operational environment with high throughput, low transaction fees, and established wallet and DEX compatibility. This phase enables BTCM to function immediately within an existing network rather than remaining inert during development. To support institutional due-diligence standards, Bitcoin Munari’s presale contracts and Solana-phase infrastructure have undergone independent verification. The project completed the Solidproof Smart Contract Audit along with the Spy Wolf Smart Contract Audit , both evaluating operational integrity and contract reliability. Team identity validation was conducted through the Spy Wolf KYC Verification , providing additional transparency typically required by enterprise participants assessing early-stage blockchain systems. The forthcoming Munari mainnet adds capabilities relevant to institutional use cases. The chain uses delegated Proof-of-Stake for validator participation, integrates an EVM-compatible execution layer for contract deployment, and includes optional privacy settings for transaction visibility control. Governance mechanisms allow BTCM holders to participate in protocol decisions, forming a structured environment for long-term operation. Technical Architecture Built for Multi-Layer Execution The Munari architecture incorporates components designed for sustained utility across several development stages: Delegated Proof-of-Stake validator framework Staking and delegation mechanisms tied to BTCM EVM-compatible smart-contract engine Privacy configuration options On-chain governance functions 1:1 migration bridge between Solana and the mainnet These components form an execution environment suitable for decentralized applications, programmable financial systems, and controlled transaction logic. BTCM functions as the unit for transaction fees, validator staking, and contract execution, maintaining consistent utility from the Solana phase through mainnet deployment. Fixed-Supply Allocation Providing Defined Economic Parameters The BTCM supply is capped at 21,000,000 tokens , divided into categories supporting public access, validator rewards, liquidity, development activity, and ecosystem expansion. Allocation: Public presale: 11,130,000 BTCM Validator rewards: 6,090,000 BTCM Liquidity reserves: 1,680,000 BTCM Team under vesting: 1,050,000 BTCM Marketing and ecosystem: 1,050,000 BTCM The presale introduces the first access stage. Round 1 is priced at $0.35 , with a launch reference of $6.00 , producing a modeled 1,614% ROI for the opening tier. Presale tokens have no vesting period and activate upon BTCM’s release on Solana. The ten-round progression aligns early distribution with the platform’s multi-phase development cycle. Phased Integration Path from Solana to the Mainnet Bitcoin Munari’s roadmap links each stage to operational outcomes. The Solana phase delivers fast transfers, liquidity access, and early integration with decentralized tools. The migration bridge transitions BTCM to the mainnet on a 1:1 basis, maintaining supply consistency. The mainnet then introduces staking, contract deployment, governance participation, privacy settings, and application development. Additional stages include wallets, enterprise integrations, DeFi modules, and developer grant programs. This progression aligns BTCM with the functional categories institutions use when assessing blockchain systems. title: Dollar Strength Surges Ahead of Critical Payrolls Data While Sterling Plunges After CPI Shock
body: BitcoinWorld Dollar Strength Surges Ahead of Critical Payrolls Data While Sterling Plunges After CPI Shock The forex markets are experiencing dramatic shifts as the US dollar demonstrates remarkable strength ahead of crucial payrolls data, while the British pound faces significant pressure following disappointing CPI figures. These currency movements create both challenges and opportunities for cryptocurrency traders navigating the interconnected world of digital and traditional finance. What’s Driving the Dollar Strength in Current Markets? The US dollar continues to show impressive dollar strength against major currencies as investors position themselves ahead of the non-farm payrolls report. Market participants are closely watching for signals about the Federal Reserve’s next moves on interest rates. The dollar index has climbed 0.8% this week, reflecting growing confidence in the US economic outlook compared to other major economies. Why Payrolls Data Matters for Currency Traders The upcoming payrolls data represents one of the most significant economic indicators for forex markets. Strong employment numbers could signal continued economic resilience, potentially supporting further dollar appreciation. However, unexpectedly weak figures might trigger a reversal in recent gains. Traders are monitoring several key factors: Non-farm payrolls growth expectations Unemployment rate projections Average hourly earnings data Labor force participation rates Sterling Decline Accelerates After CPI Disappointment The British pound has experienced a sharp sterling decline following the latest Consumer Price Index release. UK inflation data came in below expectations, raising questions about the Bank of England’s monetary policy trajectory. The pound fell 1.2% against the dollar and 0.8% against the euro in immediate reaction to the news. Currency Pair Movement Key Driver GBP/USD -1.2% UK CPI miss EUR/GBP +0.8% Diverging inflation trends USD/JPY +0.6% Dollar strength CPI Inflation Impact on Global Currency Markets The recent CPI inflation data from the United Kingdom has sent ripples across global currency markets. Lower-than-expected inflation readings suggest the Bank of England might delay further interest rate hikes, reducing the pound’s attractiveness to yield-seeking investors. This development highlights how CPI inflation figures can dramatically alter currency valuations and trading strategies. Navigating Forex Markets During Economic Data Releases Successful navigation of forex markets requires understanding how economic indicators interact with currency values. The current environment demonstrates several key principles for traders: Economic data surprises often trigger immediate currency movements Central bank expectations drive medium-term trends Cross-currency correlations can create trading opportunities Risk management becomes crucial during high-volatility periods Actionable Insights for Modern Traders Traders can leverage these market movements by implementing strategic approaches. Monitoring economic calendars, understanding central bank communications, and maintaining flexible position sizing can help capitalize on volatility while managing risk. The interplay between traditional forex markets and cryptocurrency valuations offers additional dimensions for portfolio diversification. Unprecedented opportunities emerge when traditional currency movements create ripple effects across digital asset markets. The current dollar strength and sterling weakness present unique conditions for astute traders who understand the interconnected nature of global financial markets. FAQs What economic indicators most affect currency values? Key indicators include employment data, inflation figures (CPI), GDP growth, central bank decisions, and retail sales numbers. Each provides insights into economic health and potential policy changes. How does the Federal Reserve influence the US dollar? The Federal Reserve impacts the dollar through interest rate decisions, quantitative easing programs, and forward guidance about future monetary policy. What role does the Bank of England play in sterling valuation? The Bank of England sets UK monetary policy, including interest rates and asset purchase programs, which directly affect pound sterling’s attractiveness to international investors. How do payrolls data affect cryptocurrency markets? Strong payrolls data can strengthen the dollar, potentially creating headwinds for dollar-denominated cryptocurrencies. However, the relationship is complex and influenced by multiple factors including risk appetite and inflation expectations. Where can I track real-time forex market movements? Major financial platforms like Bloomberg and Reuters provide comprehensive forex coverage, while trading platforms offer real-time charts and analysis tools. title: Crypto Traders See Bullish Tailwind: Hassett Jumps In Fed Chair Odds
body: Donald Trump has pushed the Federal Reserve back into the center of the crypto macro narrative, telling reporters he “already” knows who should succeed Jerome Powell and triggering a sharp repricing in real-money prediction markets in favor of Kevin Hassett. In remarks in the Oval Office, Trump said: “I think I already know my choice,” when asked about the next Fed chair. He added that he would “love to get the guy currently in there out right now, but people are holding me back,” a clear swipe at Powell without naming him. Trump also hinted at the shape of his shortlist, saying, “We have some surprising names and we have some standard names that everybody’s talking about. And we may go the standard way. It’s nice to every once in a while go politically correct.” That was enough to move markets. On Polymarket and Kalshi, contracts on “Who will Trump nominate as Fed Chair?” quickly converged around Hassett, with odds in the mid-40s to high-40s percent range. Jim Bianco summarized the shift by writing: “He wants Bessent but will take Hassett. The rest get to take selfies in the Oval Office.” In a follow-up, he noted that “Hassett (blue) is separating himself from the pack and is on the verge of being the first person to trade over 50%,” as prediction markets pushed his contract well clear of rivals. Kalshi’s own social media account underscored the move: “BREAKING: Trump thinks he ‘already knows’ who will be next Fed Chair. 47% chance it’s Kevin Hassett.” The pseudonymous trader Byzantine General zoomed out to the timeline, pointing out that “Powell’s term ends May next year,” and sketching out a Q2 scenario with “a FED chair that listens to Trump” and “tariff dividends for plebs,” before cautioning that “you never know with Trump of course, but man, there could be something cooking.” Related Reading: Crypto Market Wipes Out $1 Trillion Since October: Analyzing The Forces Behind The Crash What Hassett Could Mean For The Crypto Market For macro-oriented crypto traders, the key is the policy signal embedded in those probabilities. Hassett is widely perceived as more dovish than Powell and more aligned with Trump’s preference for easier financial conditions. That is why trader CRG (@MacroCRG), framed the moment as the arrival of a “New hand picked super dove as Fed chair coming soon.” Macro and crypto analyst Alex Krüger went further, arguing that the Fed-chair race is the real medium-term driver for risk assets once the current FOMC noise fades. “Here’s the next macro catalyst after the FOMC. A bullish catalyst the market is paying no heed to atm. It’s hard to peer into the horizon when stressed to the marrow about the present,” he wrote, adding that “the most bullish choices would be Hassett (likely), Rieder (possibly) and Zervos (unlikely).” Related Reading: Crypto Carnage Continues — Tom Lee Exposes What’s Really Going On The reason crypto traders care is straightforward: crypto assets trade as high-beta, liquidity-sensitive risk assets. A chair seen as more willing to cut rates faster, tolerate easier financial conditions or respond aggressively to equity and growth weakness is, in market logic, a structural tailwind for the long-run liquidity environment that underpins speculative flows into bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. At the same time, Trump’s open pressure on Powell and his readiness to talk about replacing the Fed chair in overtly political terms reinforce another strand of the crypto thesis. The more investors worry about the politicization of US monetary policy and the erosion of central-bank independence, the more compelling the “Bitcoin as hedge against political and institutional risk” narrative becomes for a subset of allocators. For now, nothing has changed at the Fed. Powell remains in office, and all that has moved is a set of probability distributions on prediction markets. But as those distributions shift toward Kevin Hassett, crypto traders are already treating the prospective hand-off as a latent, potentially significant bullish tailwind building in the background. At press time, the total crypto market cap was at $3.11 trillion. Featured image created with DALL.E, chart from TradingView.com

title: US Treasury Leans On Stablecoins For $38T Debt; Where Best Wallet Token ($BEST) Fits
body: Quick Facts: The US Treasury now openly treats stablecoins and money-market funds as structural buyers of Treasury bills, supporting long-term demand for US debt. The new US debt strategy is starting to sound a lot like a crypto thesis. US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent just laid out how the department plans to keep funding its $38T federal debt without blowing up borrowing costs: money-market funds and stablecoins. In his Treasury Market Conference speech, Bessent highlighted that money-market funds already sit around $7.5T and have added nearly $1T in the past year. Stablecoins, meanwhile, are worth about $300B today but are expected to grow tenfold by 2030, helped by the GENIUS Act. Both groups already allocate heavily into Treasury bills, and Treasury now explicitly treats them as long-term demand pillars when planning issuance. That’s a big shift. Stablecoins are no longer just a side quest for crypto traders; they’re being positioned as part of the plumbing that keeps the US government funded. If stablecoins become a $3T+ market dominated by tokenized dollars and T-bill-backed assets, on-chain settlement volume and wallet usage should rise in lockstep. Liquidity flows, yields, and even macro policy will increasingly run through wallets, bridges, and DeFi rails. This is where wallet-native tokens come in. title: Best Crypto Tax Software for CPAs and Tax Professionals 2025
body: In recent years, an increasing number of retailers and institutions have joined the crypto bandwagon, investing and trading in the market. If you’re a tax professional, chances are you’ve found yourself learning how cryptocurrencies work so that you can efficiently assist your clients in fulfilling their tax obligations. As it is with general finance, using the right crypto tax software will prove to be invaluable for your process. This article discusses the best crypto tax software tools that a certified public accountant (CPA) or a tax professional can use to calculate crypto taxes for their clients. It also highlights various enterprise software options and how these tax tools work for tax experts. Main takeaways: Growing crypto adoption has increased the need for CPAs and tax professionals to properly understand and manage crypto-related tax obligations. Crypto tax software can automate important tasks such as tracking, analyzing, and reconciling transactions across wallets, exchanges, and blockchains. Using crypto tax platforms can significantly reduce human error, save time, and help CPAs stay compliant. Most platforms allow CPAs to collaborate with their clients, review missing information, optimize for certain tax strategies, and more. Top 5 Crypto Tax Software for CPAs and Tax Professionals Whether you are a seasoned crypto tax professional or you’re new to the space, we will discuss five top cryptocurrency tax tools for CPAs that you can use. Pay attention to the professional features comparison as we discuss them. .cp-only-mobile{display:none} @media(max-width:720px){ .cp .table .price .cp-only-mobile{display:inline;font-weight:600;margin-right:.25rem} } Name Key Pros Price Rating Koinly Best Overall for CPAs & Tax Professionals Dedicated accountant portal AI-assisted transaction classification Supports 420+ exchanges & 25,000+ assets Cost-effective multi-client licensing Price: $49 - $199 4.9/5 Visit Website Read Review TokenTax Best for Full-Service CPA Support Offers one-on-one CPA collaboration Real-time tax previews & instant form generation Excellent for complex client cases Strong enterprise & audit support Price: $65 - $1999 4.8/5 Visit Website CoinTracker Best for Large Firms & Client Management Powerful client dashboard for CPAs AI-powered transaction search Partnerships with TurboTax, H&R Block & Solana White-glove training available Price: $59 - $599 4.7/5 20% OFF for Cryptopotato readers Visit Website Read Review CoinLedger Best for Fast Client Onboarding Easy bulk import for clients Simple CPA dashboard for managing reports Strong tax software integrations Great for beginners needing guidance Price: $49 - $199 4.6/5 10% OFF for Cryptopotato readers Visit Website Read Review CryptoTaxCalculator Best for DeFi, NFTs & Complex Transactions Handles advanced DeFi, NFT & smart contract activity Granular reconciliation tools for CPAs Strong multi-jurisdiction support Real-time collaboration with clients Price: $49 - $499 4.5/5 Visit Website Koinly Koinly is often regarded as one of the most popular professional crypto tax platforms, due to its user-friendly interface, cost-effectiveness, and overall features. Koinly has a dedicated section for accountants, serving over 6,000 of them. Here, CPAs can use a single account to monitor the crypto trades of multiple clients simultaneously. Harnessing artificial intelligence, Koinly automates the transaction monitoring process, helping tax experts determine tax-deductible trades. Pricing: Koinly offers three pricing packages for CPAs and tax accountants. They are: Starter package (5 licenses): $69/license. Growth package (10 licenses): $59/license. Scale package (30 licenses): $49/license. NOTE: CPAs assign each license to their client to generate tax reports. Key Features: Supports 420+ exchanges and wallets. Supports over 25,000 cryptocurrencies. Crypto tax calculator. Portfolio tracker. Customer support. TokenTax TokenTax is a crypto tax software designed for professional use. It works with accounting firms and enterprises to track crypto transactions and generate tax reports for clients. TokenTax reviews show that the platform provides instant access to tax forms, tax estimate previews in real-time, and swift data imports. TokenTax has collaborated with TurboTax to ease the tax filing process for users. It also boasts a dedicated customer support team to help guide users through its platform. Pricing: Basic: $65/year. Premium: $199/year. Pro: $1,999/year. VIP: $3,499/year. Key Features: Crypto tax calculator. Crypto profit calculator. Enables one-on-one interactions with in-house CPAs. Crypto transaction reconciliation. CoinTracker CoinTracker is another top choice for CPAs and tax accountants seeking crypto tax software. In its dedicated section for tax professionals, the platform provides CPAs with efficient client management features . This way, they can monitor and track their clients’ data through a single dashboard. It also allows tax accountants to purchase plans on behalf of their clients. The tax professional crypto software enables specific transaction searches using its AI-powered transaction search tool. It also offers one-on-one training sessions to help CPAs easily understand the tools. The tax platform partners with various platforms, including H&R Block, Intuit TurboTax, and the Solana Foundation. Pricing: Free (excludes tax filing). Base: $59/tax year. Prime: $199/tax year. Ultra: $599/tax year. Full Services: $3,499/tax year. Key Features: White glove partnership. Support team. Crypto profit calculator. Tax loss harvesting. Portfolio tracking. CoinLedger CoinLedger is another crypto tax software for accountants seeking automated platforms to serve their clients. It provides an interface where CPAs can manage their clients’ entire dashboard after helping clients import their crypto transactions. Then, tax accountants can easily view, download, and file tax reports on their clients’ behalf. Tax experts can also reconcile missing transactions for their clients. For tax experts new to crypto, CoinLedger offers a “Crypto Taxes 101 guide” to help them understand everything they need. This encompasses how crypto works and how to prepare tax reports. Pricing: Portfolio tracking: $0 Hobbyist: $49 Investor: $99 Pro: $199+ Key Features: Crypto tax calculator. Profit calculator. Portfolio tracker. Tax software integration. Chat support. CryptoTaxCalculator CryptoTaxCalculator is regarded as one of the best cryptocurrency tax tools for CPAs and tax accountants because of its inherent features. Through the Accountant Portal, CPAs can add clients. They can also import, track, and review their clients’ crypto-focused data. CPAs can also delve deeper into individual clients’ dashboards to collaborate with them in real-time through actions, such as viewing their tax obligations, leaving notes, and reconciling missing transactions. This tax professional crypto software has joined forces with leaders in the accounting world, such as Grant Thornton, Cadena Legal, Gordon Law, and Citrin Cooperman. Pricing: CryptoTaxCalculator allows CPAs and accountants to oversee their clients’ dashboards in the Accountant Portal for free. However, clients will pay for services within the following packages: Rookie: $49. Hobbyist: $99. Investor: $249. Trader: $499. Key Features: Smart contract transactions. Tax loss harvesting. Portfolio tracking. Customer support team. Support for multiple jurisdictions. What are Crypto Tax Software Tools? As a CPA or tax professional, you know that your clients are required to pay taxes on their crypto transactions. But what kinds of crypto transactions are taxable? Here is a breakdown of taxable events within the crypto market in accordance with most jurisdictions: Capital gains taxes: They refer to the taxation of profits on crypto sale and swap, and the use of crypto to purchase goods or services. Income taxes: They apply to crypto earned from activities such as mining, staking, fork events, and airdrops. It also encompasses salaries and wages paid using crypto. The truth is that compiling these taxable events together is time-consuming and prone to human error. Hence, crypto tax software makes it easy for one to compile bulk crypto transactions and determine the applicable taxes. Not just that, but many of these tools will help you with identifying the best strategies to decrease crypto taxes owed by your clients. Crypto tax software is an automated platform designed to help users compile and calculate the applicable taxes on their crypto transactions. It achieves this by tracking users’ transactions across various blockchains, crypto projects, exchanges, and Web3 wallets. The tax tool also helps with the submission of tax reports. This way, users can appropriately cover their crypto tax obligations. Why Do CPAs and Tax Professionals Need Crypto Tax Software? CPAs and tax professionals are often hired to assist individuals and businesses in compiling and filing accurate tax returns. Cryptocurrencies could be among the taxable events. Even if you’re well aware of how crypto taxes work, handling all that work manually is just tedious, time-consuming, not to mention prone to human mistakes. It is important to use software that makes it easy to navigate the complexities of the crypto industry while compiling the applicable taxe for your clients. This way, you can provide accurate tax filing after scanning through every transaction for a given tax year. It also enables you to provide expert consultation services to clients. Using crypto tax software helps CPA and tax professionals to create foolproof tax reports, avoiding human errors in the process. It also saves the time and resources that would have otherwise been spent on other activities. As a result, you can serve more clients simultaneously. As crypto is still an evolving ecosystem, the applicable tax laws implemented in various countries may change over time. Instead of staying up-to-date with every updated tax regulation, tax professionals can rely on crypto tax tools to ensure regulatory compliance with the local laws of their clients. CPAs and tax experts can also use crypto tax software tools for their personal use. If they decide to venture into the crypto world, these professionals can monitor their transactions across various blockchains, projects, wallets, and exchanges. How Do Crypto Tax Tools Work for CPAs and Tax Experts Regardless of the crypto tax software tool that a CPA or tax accountant chooses, they often follow a similar path to manage their clients’ crypto data effectively. Here’s how it works: Step 1: Create an Account on the Platform The first thing to do as a tax accountant is to create an account on a crypto tax software platform. Ensure you register as a CPA and not a regular user. This way, you would have all the needed tools to oversee your clients’ dashboards. Step 2: Invite Your Clients The next thing is to invite your clients to create an account on the same platform using a link you provide them with. Once they create their accounts, the platform usually provides the client with a step-by-step process to import their crypto transactions across wallets, exchanges, blockchains, and projects. Alternatively, clients can upload their data through CSV or API. Step 3: Review Clients’ Transactions As your clients upload their crypto transactions directly or through CSV and API, you, as the CPA or tax expert, gain access to their transactions. You can then flag missing price history and other incomplete data for reconciliation. Some platforms allow you to work with AI-powered tools to ease the review process. During this stage, you can deduce whether your client is eligible to benefit from tax loss harvesting and other deductions to save their money. Step 4: Download the Tax Report(s) The final step is to download the completed tax form in one click. These include IRS Form 8949, Schedule D, Schedule 1, Capital Gains CSV, and Transaction History CSV. The crypto tax software provides the creation of tax reports that are compatible with the local tax laws, freeing the CPA from much hassle. It is worth noting that before downloading the tax report, most crypto tax software mandates that your clients purchase a plan that matches their number of transactions. FAQs Do I need a crypto tax tool as an accountant? Yes, you do. Using a crypto tax tool helps to make your work easier. You won’t have to spend hours scanning through your clients’ crypto transactions, especially those who are heavy crypto users. You also eliminate the risk of human error while reviewing transactions. It also saves you from spending hours understanding everything about how crypto works. Are crypto tax tools free for accountants and tax professionals? On some platforms, such as CryptoTaxCalculator, crypto tax tools are available to accountants and tax professionals at no cost. However, platforms like Koinly require users to purchase a plan. Still, in most cases, clients have to pay for full access to tax tools. What crypto tax software do professional tax preparers use? There is no one-size-fits-all crypto tax software for tax accountants. This article discusses five options for CPAs to consider. When choosing a platform, the tax preparer may weigh several options, including pricing, supported features, the number of integrations, the support system, and an educational section. This way, they can choose the appropriate crypto tax software that works well for them and their clients. Conclusion Understanding the crypto sphere for the sake of helping clients fulfill their tax obligations can be difficult for most CPAs. Tax accountants no longer have to spend hours trying to wrap their heads around how crypto works before they can work for crypto taxpayers.
